name: futurehouse-research-agent
description: An AI research agent that provides scientific research capabilities through FutureHouse's platform, offering four specialized research job types: Crow (PaperQA2), Falcon (Deep PaperQA2), Owl (HasAnyone), and Phoenix for comprehensive scientific literature analysis and research assistance.

OPENAI_API_KEY.name: OpenAI API Key
OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenAI services, used for text generation and embeddings

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.name: Anthropic API Key
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key for Anthropic Claude services, used for advanced text generation

FUTUREHOUSE_API_KEY.name: FutureHouse API Key
FUTUREHOUSE_API_KEY.description: API key for FutureHouse platform to access research job services (Crow, Falcon, Owl, Phoenix)

BASE_SEPOLIA_HTTPS_RPC.name: Base Sepolia RPC URL
BASE_SEPOLIA_HTTPS_RPC.description: HTTPS RPC endpoint for Base Sepolia testnet
